title.narrative: Gripe pandêmica e outras ameaças emergentes (PIOET)
Pandemic Influenza and Other Emerging Threats (PIOET)

description.narrative: Objectives for India: The USAID Emerging Pandemic Threats PREDICT program aims to strengthen global capacity for detection and discovery of zoonotic viruses with pandemic potential. PREDICT uses a One Health approach to conduct targeted surveillance in key wildlife and livestock species, as well as people who have contact with these animals. In collaboration with GHSA and state and national partners, including reference laboratories, PREDICT works to characterize the diversity of unknown viruses in nature and enhance India’s ability to detect and respond to new and emerging viral zoonoses.

Apoia os seguintes custos programa-financiados ilustrativos: salários dos E.U., o FSN, e o TCN e o outro pessoal tal como PSCs, RSSAs, PASAs, CASUs que trabalha para o governo dos E.U. que controla, administrando, e programa de apoio e seu benefício programa-financiado como o alojamento, o curso, o transporte, as permissões de educação etc.; os contratantes institucionais que fornecem tal pessoal, aluguel, serviços da TI, a parte programa-financiada das utilidades, custos de formação do pessoal e o custo de desenvolver e de administrar programas de formação, equipamento e fontes, ICASS, combustível e manutenção do veículo, contratos da manutenção, serviços de limpeza, desenvolvimento do página da web da unidade operacional e manutenção, excedem como publicações e o custo de sua preparação (que inclui custos do pessoal), e a assistência técnica assegurar a conformidade de USG com regulamentos.

Supports the following illustrative program-funded costs: salaries of US, FSN, and TCN and other staff such as PSCs, RSSAs, PASAs, CASUs working for the US Government managing, administering, and supporting programs and their program-funded benefits such as housing, travel, transportation, education allowances etc; institutional contractors that provide such staff, rent, IT services, the program-funded share of utilities, staff training costs and the cost of developing and administering training programs, equipment and supplies, ICASS, vehicle fuel and maintenance, maintenance contracts, janitorial services, operational unit web page development and maintenance, outreach such as publications and the cost of their preparation (including staff costs), and technical assistance to ensure USG compliance with regulations.

participating-org.narrative: USAID redacted this field in accordance with the exceptions outlined in the Foreign Aid Transparency and Accountability Act of 2016.
